alert.note: Alert for Bee; Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 6:25PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN VICTORIA...CENTRAL GOLIAD AND NORTH CENTRAL BEE COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM CDT... At 625 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Weesatche to 6 miles northeast of Tulsita. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Weesatche, Weser, Ander, and Charco. This includes US Highway 183 between mile markers 626 and 638. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
